text: Arau arasye ami muchaka amara nidarsanasaha praerana karaichilo arau kaichilo, â€˜tomara sampradayaka andhakarara paraa poharalai lai aha, arau sihamtaka allahara dinaborara (arthat bibhinna sampradayara sastira dinaborara) dbaraa upadesa diyaâ€™. Iyata nidarsana ache pratyeka parama dhairyasila arau parama krtajna byaktira babe
